discourse_list.title: DVC Call Thursday - 2023-02-23- PE and Finance Scope

content.content: image1568×896 204 KB  Hey folks, @Rune announced that Thursday’s DVC call will be focusing on the PE + Finance Scopes. Please consider reviewing MIP107: The Protocol Engineering Scope Framework + MIP112: The Finance Scope Framework, as well as the corresponding points in the MIP101: The Maker Constitution prior to attending  This thread can serve to collect questions and follow up on the topics presented at the call.
